author: franzoni
body:
copy of #9915

++ data and full sim (noPU, PU, premix) => Unsch RECO together mini aod

. astSim not migrated to unscheduled
. full standard+PU tests are ok, the crashes (the 3 prod workflows) are known (dqmAk4PFL1FastL2L3ResidualCorrector) and being worked on by DQM 
=> now addressed by #9943 
. double url for DQM gui upload

++ the parent of #9915 has been used for 3 full sets of relvals submissions

https://hypernews.cern.ch/HyperNews/CMS/get/relval/3823.html (FileReadErrors)
https://hypernews.cern.ch/HyperNews/CMS/get/relval/3830.html (dqmAk4PFL1FastL2L3ResidualCorrector)
https://hypernews.cern.ch/HyperNews/CMS/get/relval/3832.html (RSS)

which completed with errors not ascribable to unscheduled.
title: Unsch RECO together mini aod (aka PAT) step - retry2
